newsitem.title: USA: Stone & Webster names financial chief.
newsitem.headline: Stone & Webster names financial chief.

text.p: Stone & Webster Inc on Monday said Thomas Langford was joining the company as executive vice president and chief financial officer.

Langford replaces Jeremiah Cronin, who decided to take early retirement after the company relocated its corporate headquarters from New York City to Boston. Cronin will continue as a consultant to the company, Stone & Webster said in a statement.
Langford, 55, comes to Stone & Webster after 26 years with Parsons Corp, an international engineering and construction company, where he served as president from 1991 to 1996.
Stone & Webster is an engineering, construction and consulting company for the power, environmental and industrial markets.
